title: Compare active campaign counts by pla...

messages.content: Compare active campaign counts by platform: display_programmatic, facebook_ads, google_ads, social_influencer, car_sales, crm_data.

content.text: I'll retrieve the campaign delivery data for each platform to compare active campaign counts.

content.text:
Perfect! I've retrieved campaign data from all six platforms. Let me compile the active campaign counts:

## **Active Campaign Counts by Platform**

| Platform | Active Campaigns | Campaign IDs |
|----------|------------------|--------------|
| **Display Programmatic** | 5 | mb_apex_motors_q1, mb_techflow_saas, mb_sportmax_apparel, mb_financefirst, mb_greenenergy |
| **Facebook Ads** | 5 | mb_fb_apex_motors, mb_fb_sportmax, mb_fb_greenenergy, mb_fb_luxebeauty, mb_fb_freshbite |
| **Google Ads** | 5 | mb_gads_apex_motors, mb_gads_techflow, mb_gads_financefirst, mb_gads_freshbite, mb_gads_urbanliving |
| **Social Influencer** | 4 | mb_inf_sportmax, mb_inf_luxebeauty, mb_inf_freshbite, mb_inf_sportmax_ugc |
| **Car Sales & Dealership** | 4 | mb_car_apex_motors, mb_car_apex_service, mb_car_urbanliving_partner, mb_car_greenenergy_ev |
| **CRM & Customer Data** | 4 | mb_crm_techflow, mb_crm_financefirst, mb_crm_luxebeauty, mb_crm_urbanliving |

---

### **Summary:**
- **Total Active Campaigns:** 27 campaigns across all platforms
- **Top 3 Platforms by Volume:** Display Programmatic, Facebook Ads, and Google Ads (5 campaigns each)
- **Distribution:** The traditional advertising platforms (display, Facebook, Google) have the most campaigns, while the specialized platforms (influencer, car sales, CRM) have 4 campaigns each.

**Key Insight:** The campaign portfolio is well-balanced with strong coverage across traditional digital advertising (15 campaigns) and emerging/specialized channels (12 campaigns).
